amendment.description: Amendment, as modified, allows religious organizations to compete for block grants provided in the bill on the same basis as private organizations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in House Report 106-562 to allow religious organizations to compete for the block grants provided in the bill on the same basis that other private organizations compete.
